    • getDiv

      public void getDiv(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Fills the Division combobox based on of the country Id the user selects 1 for Us, 2 for the UK, and 3 Canada You have to Select a country from the dropdown then press, "Set Country"

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      event - On press takes values from the text-fields and sends it to the Customer list
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteBtn

      public void deleteBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      event - On Press will delete the selected customer and all apps tied to that customer On press it will loop through every app and when it finds one that has the same customerID as the selected customer value It adds them to a list then removes all those appointments that have the same customer id until it gets to zero, once at zero the customer will be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      Parameters:
      event - On press sends the user to the customer modify page The user will get an alert if they don't have a customer selected if they do The values in the fields will be sent over to the customer modify page
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • cancel

      public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Once cancel is pressed sends alerts the user stating that any updates that haven't been saved will be lost Then takes them back to the main appointment page if they press ok or stays on the current form if they press cancel
